name: Vapana
short_description:
Vapana is a C++ console engine that can be used to create custom scenarios of turn-based RPG combat. This combat utilizes sophisticated AI that feed intelligence off of important combat statistics. 

In addition, these combat statistics can be recorded and evaluated over time so as to fit characters and equipment loadouts to reach specific optimum results in combat.

As a simple means of contributing to this project, the average user can simply run the application,  make some custom characters or pieces of equipment or even play out simulated test combats to acquire statistical information on their characters as well as the native set.

Feel free to post any interesting game idea whatsoever and post your custom files and statistics!

Particularly useful files to upload include: 

cChars.sav, cChars.sac
cEquip.sav
suci.sac
cCombat.sav
summary: RPG game statistics engine, scenario builder, and unit tester
